item.description:
How about dinner on Block Island... leave FIT at 5:30 wheels up. Block Island has a brand new terminal building that we need to check out. We could go to town and find a nice restaurant on the water to dine at. Any preferences on where to go? What a great way to start off the summer. This is a very nice easy trip 83.6 NM.

So don't forget to ask your loved one or a friend to join you. Your not going to want to miss this one and don't forget the camera.

Remember to keep your Wednesday nights free...thats Fly-out night!


http://www.airnav.com...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Dinner on the Block?
